nodes.id: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 源自台湾的跨国科技公司，成立于1989年，是全球主要的个人电脑、主板、显卡等电子产品制造商之一。该公司于2008年将代工业务分割成立和硕等公司，专注于自有品牌经营。
description.en: A Taiwanese multinational technology company founded in 1989, one of the world's leading manufacturers of personal computers, motherboards, graphics cards, and other electronic products. In 2008, the company spun off its OEM/ODM business to establish Pegatron and other companies, focusing on its own brand operations.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的共同创办人。
description.en: Co-founder of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的共同创办人，现任副董事长。
description.en: Co-founder and current Vice Chairman of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的共同创办人。
description.en: Co-founder of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的共同创办人。
description.en: Co-founder of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 华硕电脑股份有限公司的董事长。
description.en: Chairman of ASUSTeK Computer Inc.

description.zh-cn: 原为华硕的代工业务部门，于2008年分割成立，专注于电子产品代工服务。
description.en: Originally the OEM/ODM division of ASUS, it was spun off in 2008 to focus on electronics manufacturing services.

description.zh-cn: 原为华硕的非电脑代工业务部门，于2008年与和硕一同分割成立。
description.en: Originally the non-PC OEM/ODM division of ASUS, it was spun off along with Pegatron in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 全球知名的半导体公司和最大的个人电脑零件及CPU制造商。
description.en: A world-renowned semiconductor company and the largest manufacturer of personal computer parts and CPUs.

nodes.id: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司

zh-cn: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 华硕集团持股100%的子公司，专注于网络通讯及电子产品开发。
description.en: A wholly-owned subsidiary of the ASUS Group, focusing on the development of network communication and electronic products.

description.zh-cn: 一起消费者与华硕公司之间的法律纠纷，涉及笔记本电脑CPU为工程版的问题，对华硕的品牌声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: A legal dispute between a consumer and ASUS over an engineering sample CPU in a laptop, which negatively affected ASUS's brand reputation.

description.zh-cn: 因购买的华硕笔记本电脑CPU为工程版而对华硕提起诉讼索赔的当事人。
description.en: The plaintiff who sued ASUS for compensation over an engineering sample CPU in a laptop she purchased.

description.zh-cn: 一家虚拟YouTuber（VTuber）经纪公司。
description.en: A virtual YouTuber (VTuber) agency.

description.zh-cn: 因华硕旗下ROG品牌取消与Hololive的合作直播，以及中国区小编的不当言论，引发的一场公关危机。
description.en: A public relations crisis sparked by the cancellation of a promotional livestream collaboration between ASUS's ROG brand and Hololive, coupled with inappropriate remarks by a social media editor in the China region.

description.zh-cn: 时任华硕旗下品牌ROG中国区分公司总经理。
description.en: Then General Manager of ASUS's ROG brand in the China region.

description.zh-cn: 2022年1月，华硕子公司亚旭电脑桃园大园厂爆发的COVID-19群聚感染事件。
description.en: A COVID-19 cluster infection event that broke out in January 2022 at the Taoyuan Dayuan factory of ASUS subsidiary Askey Computer Corp.

description.zh-cn: 台湾桃园市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾新北市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of New Taipei City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 2022年俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰引发的国际冲突，导致国际社会对俄罗斯实施广泛经济制裁。
description.en: The international conflict triggered by Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022, leading to widespread economic sanctions against Russia by the international community.

description.zh-cn: 东欧国家，2022年遭到俄罗斯全面入侵。
description.en: An Eastern European country that was fully invaded by Russia in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 一个横跨欧亚大陆的国家，于2022年对乌克兰发动全面军事入侵。
description.en: A transcontinental country that launched a full-scale military invasion of Ukraine in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个负责灾害救助的基金会。
description.en: A foundation in Taiwan responsible for disaster relief.

relationships.source: 华硕电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: 英特尔

description.zh-cn: 自1992年起，华硕与英特尔开展合作。
description.en: ASUS began cooperating with Intel in 1992.

relationships.source: 华硕电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: 和硕联合科技

description.zh-cn: 2008年，华硕将代工业务分割出去，成立了和硕联合科技。
description.en: In 2008, ASUS spun off its OEM/ODM business to establish Pegatron.

relationships.source: 华硕电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: 永硕联合国际

description.zh-cn: 2008年，华硕将非电脑代工业务分割出去，成立了永硕联合国际。
description.en: In 2008, ASUS spun off its non-PC OEM/ODM business to establish Unihan Corporation.

relationships.source: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 亚旭电脑是华硕集团持股100%的子公司。
description.en: Askey Computer Corp. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the ASUS Group.

relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因购买的笔记本电脑CPU为工程版而向华硕提出索赔并提起诉讼。
description.en: Filed a claim and lawsuit against ASUS because the CPU in a purchased laptop was an engineering sample.

relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 该事件是一起广受关注的消费者维权及法律纠纷，对华硕的品牌声誉造成了负面冲击。
description.en: This incident was a widely publicized consumer rights and legal dispute that negatively impacted ASUS's brand reputation.

relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因取消与日本虚拟主播公司Hololive的合作，以及中国区小编的不当言论，引发公关危机，损害了品牌形象。
description.en: The cancellation of a collaboration with Japanese VTuber agency Hololive and inappropriate comments by a social media editor in the China region sparked a PR crisis, damaging the brand's image.

relationships.source: 华硕电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: Hololive production

description.zh-cn: 在中国大陆网民压力下，华硕取消了旗下ROG品牌与Hololive的合作直播工商活动。
description.en: Under pressure from mainland Chinese netizens, ASUS canceled a promotional livestream collaboration between its ROG brand and Hololive.

relationships.target: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 该群聚感染事件导致亚旭电脑大园厂被勒令停工并被地方政府罚款。
description.en: This cluster infection event led to the shutdown of Askey's Dayuan factory and fines from local governments.

relationships.target: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因亚旭电脑大园厂出现群聚事件后未依照规定立即停工，对其开罚新台币30万元。
description.en: Fined Askey Computer Corp. NT$300,000 for failing to immediately halt operations at its Dayuan factory as required after a cluster infection was discovered.

relationships.target: 亚旭电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因亚旭电脑中和厂有员工支援大园厂却隐匿疫调，对其开罚新台币30万元。
description.en: Fined Askey Computer Corp. NT$300,000 because its Zhonghe factory concealed contact history regarding employees who had supported the Dayuan factory.

relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由于俄乌战争引发的复合性挑战，华硕对俄罗斯市场的出货已停滞。
description.en: Due to complex challenges arising from the Russo-Ukrainian War, ASUS's shipments to the Russian market have been halted.

relationships.target: 华硕电脑股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰副总理公开致信华硕董事长施崇棠，呼吁其暂停在俄罗斯的业务，对华硕的决策产生影响。
description.en: The Deputy Prime Minister of Ukraine publicly sent a letter to ASUS Chairman Jonney Shih, urging the company to suspend its business in Russia, which influenced ASUS's decision-making.

relationships.source: 华硕电脑股份有限公司
relationships.target: 赈灾基金会 (台湾)

description.zh-cn: 为援助乌克兰，向财团法人赈灾基金会“赈济乌克兰专户”捐助新台币3,000万元。
description.en: To aid Ukraine, donated NT$30 million to the 'Relief for Ukraine' special account of the Taiwan Foundation for Disaster Relief.
